title: Dandy's World Tier List
description: Explore the latest tier list for Dandy's World characters, detailing rankings and insights from S to C Tier based on community feedback and game performance.
heading: Dandy's World Tier List
introText: Explore the latest tier list for Dandy's World characters, detailing rankings and insights from S to C Tier based on community feedback and game performance.

data.itemDescription: Exceptional distractor with top-tier movement speed, allowing for versatile gameplay and effective extraction capabilities
Versatile character with outstanding extraction speed and movement, capable of generating consumables to aid survival
All-rounder excelling in both distraction and extraction roles, especially effective when at one heart due to enhanced speed
Strong extractor and support character, offering team boosts and maintaining decent survivability
Vital for longer runs with the ability to generate health items, complemented by solid survival stats
Balanced all-rounder with capabilities in extraction, survival, and team support through speed enhancements
Excellent support character with high stealth, adept at assisting teammates in critical situations
Reliable distractor and support, with commendable movement and stamina for effective twisted engagement
Capable extractor with decent survivability, offering teleportation abilities to evade threats
Top-tier extractor with unparalleled speed but hindered by low survivability, making strategic play essential
Good extraction and stamina stats, but low stealth can attract unwanted attention from twisteds
Average stats with a beneficial ability to heal using in-game currency, though this may impact team resources
